vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ταρτᾰρ-όω,
cast into Tartarus or hell, [NT+8th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to send to hell, hold captive in Tartarus; a derivative of the Greek noun "Tartarus," a place of torture and torment lower than Hades in Greek and Jewish apocalyptic literature, not found in the NT condemn
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ to send to hell, hold captive in Tartarus; a derivative of the Greek noun "Tartarus," a place of torture and torment lower than Hades in Greek and Jewish apocalyptic literature, not found in the NT condemn
to cast, or thrust down to Tartarus or Gehenna, 2Pet. 2:4*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) Tartaros是希臘人認為比陰府還要低深的一處地方,
是神明執行審判之處.以色列的天啟文學也提到這樣
的地方.
2) 被關在,打入Tartaros(彼後 2:4)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) Tartaros是希腊人认为比阴府还要低深的一处地方,
是神明执行审判之处.以色列的天启文学也提到这样
的地方.
2) 被关在,打入Tartaros(彼后 2:4)
